item.title: Creative hacking
item.description: Creative hackin Introduction Mental objectives Students will acquire comprehensive knowledge about computer music and music technology and will learn theory, methods and techniques in order to create and manipulate. This course will teach the basic elements of programming in general (logic, loops, functions, objects, classes). They will also be trained in program units analysis for both the production of audio events and the control of their features and behavior through control units such as MIDI keyboards, motion, etc.
